item.title: FT Most Read: Tuesday, April 23, 2024 at 8:50 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Consulting firms step up efforts to push out their low performers
2. Goldman Sachs moves senior banker to Paris in post-Brexit revamp
3.  The wrong trousers? Retail has a new solution to the returns problem
4. Trump trial opens with allegations he tried to ‘corrupt’ 2016 US election
5. Trump masks his rage as ‘hush money’ trial starts
item.guid: FT Most Read: Tuesday, April 23, 2024 at 8:50 AM UTC
